title: Colabo
description: This ongoing project is a comprehensive workflow management tool, designed to enhance team productivity. My role involves both frontend and backend development, utilizing advanced features and ensuring seamless user experiences.

title: Atomic Signals
description: Atomic Signals is a feedback application where I stepped in when the project had a critical requirement. I took on a leadership role, guiding team members through complex use cases and ensuring that the project was delivered on time. This project highlighted my ability to adapt quickly, lead a team, and deliver quality results under tight deadlines.

title: Health Circles
description: Health Circles was my first professional project, where I contributed extensively to the frontend development. The project involved building a user-friendly interface for a healthcare platform, focusing on performance and responsiveness.
